document.full_text: world number three vera zvonareva was knocked out in the third round of the madrid open by petra kvitova on wednesday, losing 6-1 6-4 to the czech 16th seed.
document.title: second seed zvonareva loses to kvitova in madrid
lines_and_colors: world number three vera zvonareva was knocked out in the third round of the madrid open by petra kvitova on wednesday, losing 6-1 6-4 to the czech 16th seed.
